website_summaries.verdict: This serum is made with vitamin C and other skin-benefiting ingredients, and has earned more happy customers than complaints.
pros: Formulated with a blend of plant-based oils, hyaluronic acid, and witch hazel to moisturize skin and protect against premature signs of aging
Contains nourishing vitamin E. Some customers report brighter skin after using it
cons: Issues including puffy skin, blemishes, and irritation with use have been noted
Some bottles contained serum that had a foggy appearance, suggesting oxidation had occurred

I will purchase it again.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based in the good reviews, they said is a very good serum that almost do miracles. Wrong! At least no for me. I wash my face with PCA gentle face wash then use PCA daily exfoliate face wash. I use a spin brush with led light (I purchased from amazon) while the exfoliate wash is on. , rinse with warm water and then cold water. Apply my toner then use the serum. customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first, not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Initially I really liked this product. Felt my skin looked refreshed and bright and had no side effects. Within a few weeks, I developed a recurrent peeling/burning rash around my lips that lasted two months. Didn't know what was causing it because it would come and go in cycles every 5 days. Eventually, by process of elimination, I found out it was this product I had an allergic reaction to even though i made sure not to let it get close to my lips. Finally, after 7 days of discontinuing, it resolved and hasn't returned. Had to throw it out, too bad. Definitely skin-test it first. Has potential if you don't have too-sensitive skin.

I think they truly care to keep customers happy!

customer_reviews.title: Be careful!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews, but I wanted to warn people of this product!! I’m usually never allergic to any products and I have combination skin with VERY rarely dry skin.
